description:
Description:

The Marketing Coordinator will be the primary point of contact for all marketing activities associated with both our Tampa/St Pete and Melbourne offices and will be supported by our corporate office. This person will maintain and assist in development of project writeups (within CRM, Website, and other databases) for various marketing projects and submittals.

Skills and Experience:

Required Skills:

PROJECT PLAN EXECUTION

PRODUCT MARKETING

CONSUMER PRODUCT MARKETING

CONSUMER MARKETING

COMMUNICATIONS MANAGEMENT

Primary Marketing Responsibilities:

Managing and developing initial drafts of qualifications for responses to Request for Proposals (RFPs), Requests for Qualifications (RFQs), and Statement of Qualifications (SOQs)

Print, bind, and deliver RFP/Q responses when required

Maintain and assist in development of project writeups (within CRM, Website, and other databases) for various marketing projects and submittals

Maintain data and data logging to assist in tracking Marketing metrics

Assist marketing personnel with preparing company brochures and presentations

Provide general support duties for the Marketing Department such as development of forms, coordinating functions and meetings, researching client/employee gifts, etc.

Assist in preparing teams for presentations and interviews

Assist with promotional materials and planning for various internal and external events

Desired Qualifications:

Strong attention to detail and accuracy

Knowledge of the building design and construction industry preferred (Architectural, Engineering , Contractor)

Knowledge and willingness to learn emerging technology such as Artificial Intelligence preferred

Proficient knowledge of marketing techniques

Proficient computer skills (Word, Excel, Power Point, Prezi, database ( we use Deltek))

Proficient graphic design skills and knowledge of design programs (InDesign, Adobe Creative Suite, InDesign, Microsoft Publisher, etc.) and the ability to utilize complex features and functions

Proficient ability to design, layout, and write marketing literature, RFPs/RFQs, website updates, sales and marketing proposals, etc.

Experience in Word Press and Social Media Marketing is desirable

Ability to design, develop, and produce presentation materials in a variety of ways (i.e. display boards, electronic presentations, etc.)

Proficient ability to schedule your own time effectively to accomplish multiple tasks with minimal supervision

Ability to be proactive and to modify workloads to meet deadlines

Proficient at presenting information in a clear and understandable manner in both written and oral form

Ability to work with others in a team environment, exercising effective interpersonal skills

Strong organizational skills

About TEKsystems:

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.
